scripts.test: npm run test:lint && npm run test:unit && npm run test:coverage
scripts.test:unit: rm -Rf coverage && istanbul cover -x lib/avfs.js -x lib/common/constants.js -x lib/common/version.js _mocha -- -r test/bootstrap.js test/index.js
scripts.test:coverage: if ./test/bin/check-version; then istanbul check-coverage --statements 100 --functions 100 --branches 100 --lines 100; else echo 'Unsupported version, skip coverage'; fi
